thread.title: Lorne Maxwell Fread
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Lorne Maxwell Fread

author: Lorne Maxwell Fread
title: Lorne Maxwell Fread
text: Everything about Public Storage makes it the best. This is the second time my family and I have used the company. The staff is always helpful and provides the best customer service around. They always answer questions and handle concerns immediately. No matter the time of day I've visited I have felt safe and I know my property is safe. I always reccommend Public Storage to people looking for a place to keep their posessions
